name: fx_eur
detailed_description: the amount (in euros) reserved as a fee related to currency exchange rate differences during transaction processing

name: comission_eur
detailed_description: the total commission amount (in euros) applied to the transaction, including all relevant components such as MDR, fixed fees, FX adjustments, and agent or platform commissions

name: min_eur
detailed_description: the minimum commission amount (in euros) charged or applicable per transaction or settlement, as defined in the acquirer's financial terms

name: mdr_eur
detailed_description: the percentage fee (converted to euro equivalent) charged by the acquirer on the total transaction amount, representing the cost of processing card payments for the merchant

name: base_eur
short_description: Base_EUR (MDR or min/max, depending on the rule outcome)
detailed_description: the final commission amount in euros determined according to the applicable rule: either calculated as the MDR fee or adjusted to the predefined minimum or maximum commission threshold

name: agent_eur
detailed_description: the commission amount (in euros) allocated to an agent or intermediary involved in the transaction or merchant/acquirer acquisition, based on the agreed revenue-sharing or partnership terms

name: settle_eur
detailed_description: the fee amount (in euros) charged by the acquirer or payment provider for executing the settlement of funds

name: tax_reserved_eur
detailed_description: the amount (in euros) withheld or reserved to cover potential tax obligations related to the transaction, such as withholding tax or other jurisdiction-specific charges

name: other_eur
detailed_description: an additional fee amount (in euros) applied to the transaction based on specific conditions or service types

name: mer_agent_eur
detailed_description: the fee amount (in euros) payable to a merchant's appointed agent or intermediary for services such as onboarding, account management, or transaction facilitation, as defined in the partnership agreement

name: fshop_eur
detailed_description: the fee amount charged to the merchant or partner in EUR, representing the front-end (merchant-facing) commission

name: fixed_eur
detailed_description: a predefined flat fee (in euros) charged for each processed transaction, regardless of its amount or type, as specified in the applicable tariff or acquirer agreement

name: icc_eur
detailed_description: the commission amount (in euros) applied to transactions processed under intercharge or international card schemes (ICC), typically covering cross-border or interregional processing costs defined by the card network

name: amount_eur
detailed_description: The total monetary value of a payment request initiated by a customer. It represents the sum to be authorized, captured, or settled by the payment gateway, including product cost, taxes, fees, and discounts, depending on business rules.

name: card_brand_group
short_description: Payment System of the Card (Visa, MasterCard, Any)
detailed_description: In payment processing, the card brand group refers to the classification of payment cards under major networks like Visa, Mastercard, American Express etc

name: traffic_type_group
short_description: The group to which the traffic belongs (FTD-mbway, FTD-multibanco, apple_pay, blik, card, eps, ftd_openbanking, gigadat, giropay, google_pay, mbway, multibanco, oct, openbanking, payid, przelewy, sepa, sofort, wl)
detailed_description: The traffic type group categorizes transactions based on their origin, channel or payment type. This grouping helps the gateway apply appropriate processing rules, risk checks, routing logic, and compliance requirements for each transaction type

name: transaction_comission
detailed_description: the total commission amount (in orig. curr.) applied to the transaction, including all relevant components such as MDR, fixed fees, FX adjustments, and agent or platform commissions

name: country
detailed_description: Identifies the country associated with a payment card's Bank Identification Number (BIN). It helps the gateway determine the card's issuing country, enabling fraud checks, compliance enforcement, currency handling, and routing decisions based on regional or cross-border transaction rules

name: transaction_id
detailed_description: a system-generated universal unique identifier (UUID) assigned to each transaction

name: order_id
detailed_description: a unique identifier assigned to each order within the platform system, used to group related transactions

name: created_date
detailed_description: Timestamp when a payment request is initiated in the gateway

name: merchant_name
detailed_description: merchant name

name: gate_id
detailed_description: a unique identifier of the processing gateway through which the transaction was routed

name: merchant_id
detailed_description: a unique identifier assigned to the merchant

name: company_id
detailed_description: a unique identifier assigned to the merchant's legal entity within the system, used to link transactions, reports, and financial conditions to the specific company record

name: company_name
detailed_description: merchant's legal entity's name within the system, used to link transactions, reports, and financial conditions to the specific company record

name: white_label_id
detailed_description: a unique identifier of the white-label partner under which the transaction or merchant operates

name: processor_name
detailed_description: the name of the acquiring financial institution or payment provider processing transactions for the merchant

name: processor_id
detailed_description: a unique identifier assigned to the acquiring financial institution or payment provider processing transactions for the merchant

name: status
detailed_description: The current state of a payment, such as authorized, captured, declined, or refunded. It helps the gateway, merchants, and banks track progress, enforce business rules, and manage settlements or exceptions.

name: card_brand
detailed_description: In payment processing, the card brand group refers to the classification of payment cards under major networks like Visa, Mastercard, American Express etc

name: currency
detailed_description: Currency used to initiate the transaction

name: gate_name
short_description: The type of funds this gate processes (Debet and Credit Cards, apple_pay, blik, card, eps, gigadat, giropay, google_pay, mbway, multibanco, openbanking, payid, przelewy, sepa, sofort)
detailed_description: defines the category of payment instruments or channels processed through this gate (e.g., debit and credit cards, Apple Pay, Google Pay, BLIK, SEPA, Sofort, Giropay, Open Banking, etc.), indicating the specific funding source or payment flow type supported by the gateway

name: gate_descriptor
detailed_description: the identifier or descriptive name of the merchant account (MID) assigned by the acquirer within the processing gateway, used to link acquirer-side transaction data with internal gateway records for reconciliation and reporting

name: source
detailed_description: indicates the originating gateway or processing source from which the transaction data is received

name: type
detailed_description: Specifies the operation being performed. Payment (customer pays merchant), payout (funds sent to a recipient), or refund (returning a prior payment). It determines processing rules, routing, accounting, and reporting within the gateway.

name: created_date_no_time
detailed_description: The day when a payment request is initiated. It is used for tracking, reporting, reconciliation, and applying business rules like settlement cycles, refunds, or transaction validity periods.

name: endpoint_id
detailed_description: A specific channel through which a transaction is initiated or processed. It helps the gateway route transactions, apply relevant business rules, and track performance or issues by source.

name: amount
short_description: Transaction amount in the processing currency
detailed_description: The monetary value of a payment being processed

name: running_sum
short_description: Cumulative sum amount for the calendar month by processor_name in DWH
detailed_description: The cumulative total of transaction amounts over a period or batch. It helps track overall financial activity, monitor limits, reconcile accounts, and generate reports for settlements or auditing.

name: card_bank_name
detailed_description: The issuing bank of a payment card.

name: bin
detailed_description: BIN (Bank Identification Number) is the initial set of digits on a payment card that identifies its issuing bank and card type. It is used for routing, fraud checks, card validation, and applying network-specific processing rules.

name: error_code
detailed_description: Describes the code of the reason a transaction failed, used for troubleshooting and reporting.

name: error_message
detailed_description: Describes the reason a transaction failed, used for troubleshooting and reporting.

name: external_error_code
detailed_description: the numeric or alphanumeric code returned by an external system (such as an acquirer, gateway, or payment provider) that identifies the specific error or decline reason for a transaction

name: external_error_message
detailed_description: the error description or code received from an external system (e.g., acquirer, gateway, or payment provider) explaining the reason for a transaction failure, rejection, or processing issue

name: main_requisite
detailed_description: Key required information for processing a transaction, such as card number or account details.

name: user_id
detailed_description: Unique identifier for the customer or account initiating the transaction.

name: merchant_error_code
detailed_description: Specific code returned to indicate why a transaction failed at the merchant's end.

name: merchant_error_message
detailed_description: Text description of the merchant's error for logging or customer support.

name: rate_plan_id
detailed_description: a unique identifier of the tariff or fee plan assigned to the merchant, defining the applicable commission rates, fees, and financial conditions

name: transaction_type
short_description: Transaction type (payout, reversal, sale) - analytics mapping
detailed_description: Specifies the operation being performed. Payment (customer pays merchant), payout (funds sent to a recipient), or refund (returning a prior payment). It determines processing rules, routing, accounting, and reporting within the gateway.

name: transaction_status
detailed_description: Current state of the transaction, e.g., authorized, captured, declined, or refunded.

name: mapping
detailed_description: Full BIN_country name

name: european_union
short_description: Flag whether the country belongs to EU
detailed_description: Flag indicating if the transaction involves an EU-based entity for compliance or reporting.

name: eea
detailed_description: Flag indicating if the transaction involves an EEA-based entity, impacting regulations and fees.

name: merchant
detailed_description: Identifier or name of the business merchant receiving the payment.

name: merchant_group
detailed_description: Categorization of merchants for reporting, risk management, or fee structures.

name: kam
detailed_description: Key Account Manager assigned to the merchant, used for support, escalation, and relationship management.

name: fx_date
detailed_description: the specific date on which the applied exchange rate was valid or recorded, used to convert transaction amounts or fees from the original currency into euros

name: fx_rate
detailed_description: The conversion rate used to calculate amounts between different currencies.

name: proc_group
detailed_description: the name of the acquiring financial institution or payment provider processing transactions for the merchant (grouped)

name: descr_group
detailed_description: the identifier or descriptive name of the merchant account (MID) assigned by the acquirer within the processing gateway, used to link acquirer-side transaction data with internal gateway records for reconciliation and reporting

name: Acquirer
detailed_description: the name of the acquiring financial institution or payment provider processing transactions for the merchant

name: Legal_entity_abb
detailed_description: Short name or code of the legal entity handling the transaction.

name: balance_mapping
detailed_description: Merchant Identification (MID) account used in reconciliation reports for payments received.

name: payout_mapping
short_description: Payout MID Account in Reconciliation Files
detailed_description: MID account used in reconciliation reports for payouts or disbursements.

name: agent_fee
detailed_description: Commission earned by an agent in the original currency of the transaction.

name: card_type
detailed_description: the payment network or scheme under which the transaction was processed (e.g., Visa, Mastercard, or other payment providers such as UnionPay, Amex, or local card schemes)

name: tax_reserve_cost
detailed_description: the amount (in orig currency) withheld or reserved to cover potential tax obligations related to the transaction, such as withholding tax or other jurisdiction-specific charges

name: trx
detailed_description: a predefined flat fee (in orig. curr.) charged for each processed transaction, regardless of its amount or type, as specified in the applicable tariff or acquirer agreement

name: minimal
detailed_description: the minimum commission amount (in orig. curr.) charged or applicable per transaction or settlement, as defined in the acquirer's financial terms

name: mdr
detailed_description: the percentage fee (orig. currency) charged by the acquirer on the total transaction amount, representing the cost of processing card payments for the merchant

name: agent
detailed_description: the commission amount (in original currency) allocated to an agent or intermediary involved in the transaction or merchant/acquirer acquisition, based on the agreed revenue-sharing or partnership terms

name: settlement
detailed_description: the fee amount (in orig. currency) charged by the acquirer or payment provider for executing the settlement of funds

name: fx
detailed_description: the amount (in orig. curr.) reserved as a fee related to currency exchange rate differences during transaction processing

name: frontshop
detailed_description: the fee amount charged to the merchant or partner in the original transaction currency, representing the front-end (merchant-facing) commission

name: additional
detailed_description: an additional fee amount (in orig. curr.) applied to the transaction based on specific conditions or service types

name: maximal
detailed_description: the maximum commission amount (in orig.curr.) charged or applicable per transaction or settlement, as defined in the acquirer's financial terms

name: agent_fixed
detailed_description: Flat fee charged or earned by an agent per transaction

name: trx_currency
detailed_description: Currency in which the transaction is processed by the gateway

name: trx_min
detailed_description: the minimum commission amount (in orig.curr.) charged or applicable per transaction or settlement, as defined in the acquirer's financial terms

name: vat_type
detailed_description: the classification of the applied VAT, indicating the tax treatment of the transaction (e.g., standard rate, reduced rate, zero-rated, or VAT-exempt), based on the service nature and jurisdiction

name: vat
detailed_description: the value-added tax amount applied to commissions or service fees, calculated according to the applicable VAT rate and charged in compliance with tax regulations

name: monthly_fee
detailed_description: the recurring service fee charged to the partner in the original transaction currency, representing monthly maintenance of the account

name: item_id
detailed_description: ordinal number of the fee
